content.question: The writer is considering deleting sentence 16 from the passage. Should the writer keep or delete sentence 16?

choices.label: Keep it, because the discussion of work ethic is the most important point in this passage, and it is best to end the passage with the most important point.
Keep it, because teens would benefit by the advice to get a part-time job in order to start developing the work ethic they will need.
Delete it, because its conclusion does not logically follow from the line of reasoning in the passage.
Delete it, because it provides direct advice to teens who may not care about the writerâ€™s opinion.

content.answer: Delete it, because its conclusion does not logically follow from the line of reasoning in the passage.

skill.text: Skill 6.A: Develop a line of reasoning and commentary that explains it throughout an argument.
